document_data.mainbody:
Malthus was a Dragonsoul of the reborn Cult of the Dragon that arose as a great threat to the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR.
As a spellcaster, Malthus focused on magic that utilized acids and poisonous gas such as the kinf often found in swamps.
Malthus wielded a large, highly-decorated staff in battle.
During the 1480s DR, Malthus led the cults efforts to find the grave of the former adventurer Belast Massandar in Neverdeath Graveyard in order converse with his spirit. The cult believe that Massandars spirit could lead them to the resting place of Cruven Gantara, which in turn would allow them access to a portal leading to the Flame Fault on Tuern.
Malthus and his agents were thwarted by the efforts of the Harpers agent Boward and her ally, the Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge.
